name: Powerful DABL
description:
Powerful DABL - Find yourself in a snowy forest filled with various creatures and monsters! Armed with a bow, start destroying hordes of enemies, opening your way out! Will you be able to protect yourself from the monsters and find a way out of this forest without dying? You won't know this without trying the game!

The game is an action roguelike, find yourself in a snowy location, go through corridors filled with enemies, and only by destroying all the monsters can you move forward!

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Different types of monsters
- Lots of levels
